DOC.brief_summary: Background : Prostate cancer ( PCa ) common cancer men . When treat early enough typically curable . However , common treatment , radical prostatectomy radiation therapy , often result significant negative outcome regard sexual , psychological social function . Both men partner identify need information support address sexual health concern treatment . However , sexual rehabilitation intervention develop rigorously assess . Purpose : The investigator propose develop pilot test new program meet sexual health need men PCa partner use online , professionally facilitated education/support program . The goal program improve sexual function , intimacy mood men partner treatment localize PCa . The program offer Cancer Chat Canada , exist well-tested Canadian platform professionally facilitate support group program . What Participants Can Expect : A total 24 men female partner ( 48 individual ) recruit assigned one two group . The first group participate program immediately ; second group offer program 5-month delay . The decision group start immediately later make randomly ( chance ) . Both group men partner ask complete questionnaire three time , end program , provide researcher feedback satisfied program , change make , thing learn result program , suggestion improve program . Participants must access computer , Internet connection willing attend online , chat room meeting week 1.5 hour 6 week . Implications : Sexual rehabilitation high need men affect PCa , difficult access . The investigator hope improve access sexual health care study .
DOC.brief_title: A Feasibility Study Online Intervention Sexual Rehabilitation Prostate Cancer
DOC.criteria: Men treat localized prostate cancer AND men must 636 month postprostatectomy radiation ( primary treatment ) prostate cancer Must heterosexual , cocohabiting partner willing participate Must speak read English Must able use computer internet access Homosexual couple include study Major selfreported psychiatric illness Couples screen 30 DAS ( Dyadic Adjustment Scale )
